metadata.title: CVE-2023-6610 on Ubuntu 22.04 FIPS Compliant (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
An out-of-bounds read vulnerability was found in smb2_dump_detail infs/smb/client/smb2ops.c in the Linux Kernel. This issue could allow a localattacker to crash the system or leak internal kernel information.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-6610` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-unsigned-6.1.0-1035-oem - 6.1.0-1035.35
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1019-oem - 6.5.0-1019.20
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-27-generic - 6.5.0-27.28~22.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-27-generic - 6.5.0-27.28~22.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-27-generic-64k - 6.5.0-27.28~22.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-27-lowlatency - 6.5.0-27.28.1~22.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-27-lowlatency-64k - 6.5.0-27.28.1~22.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1011-starfive - 6.5.0-1011.12~22.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1017-aws - 6.5.0-1017.17~22.04.2
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1018-azure - 6.5.0-1018.19~22.04.2
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1017-gcp - 6.5.0-1017.17~22.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1020-oracle - 6.5.0-1020.20~22.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1020-oracle-64k - 6.5.0-1020.20~22.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1014-nvidia - 6.5.0-1014.14
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1014-nvidia-64k - 6.5.0-1014.14
No subscription required
